title: Frosted Blood
description: Given the current state of the nation, this book feels very relevant to today's societal issues although cast in a fantastical light.Good versus Bad or is it?Which side are you on? How do you know which side is correct, it depends on your point of view. What information have you used to base your opinion of life and right and wrong? Everything is not all black or white.
author: Larry Pellitteri
